item.title: Motion Graphic Video Creation with Voice-over - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced motion graphic designer to create an engaging intro video for a case study related to the fashion industry. The video will introduce the scenario of a new head of layout at a high-profile fashion magazine, showcasing their first encounter with the Editor-in-Chief. Your task will visually depict this narrative using an existing After Effects template and the provided script.

NOTE: There are example videos attached.

Responsibilities:
- Utilize an After Effects template to create a dynamic intro video.
- Integrate a professional voice-over to enhance the narrative.
- Ensure the video aligns with the provided script and follows the content phases from the attached "Abilitie AI Case Video Production Template.xlsx."
- Maintain consistency in style with three example videos that will be provided as references.
- Deliver a final product that effectively communicates the brand's message and captivates our target audience.

Required Skills:
- Proficient in Adobe After Effects and video editing.
- Experience in motion graphics, ideally within the fashion or publishing industry.
- Ability to write and integrate scripts with visual content.
- Capacity to source or produce professional voice-over.

Project Deliverable:
- A completed intro video, approximately 60-90 seconds in length.
- The video should be fully edited and ready for review and feedback.
- Integration of the voice-over with the visual content.


Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube channel long term work - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor to edit our long-form videos - we have 3 channels that we need editing done for and we have long term work available.

We will send you the files and we remove all the dead air and we provide everything that needs to go into the video. Here is one example of one of our videos - https://youtu.be/dhF9w-DDVug

You can use any editing software as long as we can get the desired result. We will provide a sample of the work we are after. We have ongoing work and can provide videos for editing for a long time.  

We are looking for someone reliable and who returns the work on time, we need someone who has an intermediate level of experience with editing, animation, and graphics.

We are very easy to work with and are happy to negotiate and pay a fair price for anyone that has the right level of experience.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Video, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Native Spain Spanish Translator - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are seeking a talented and experienced native Spain Spanish Translator to join our team and assist in translating video content from English into Spanish. As a Translator, you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our video content is accessible to Spanish-speaking audiences while maintaining accuracy and cultural relevance.

Responsibilities:

Translate short video Ad scripts (English to Spanish, around 100-200 words each) with an organic tone
Using editing tools (We will provide a free online tool like CapCut to auto-generate captions) to do a quality check of captions, and make sure they are at the right place without misspelling. Then export the SRT caption files.Translate video scripts, subtitles, and spoken content from English into Spanish.
Review and edit translations to ensure linguistic accuracy, fluency, and cultural appropriateness.
Collaborate with our production team to ensure synchronization of audio and video elements.
Perform quality checks on the final output to ensure high-quality translations.

Requirements:

Proficiency in both written and spoken Spanish and fluency in English.
Proven experience as a translator, particularly in translating video content.
Strong knowledge of cultural nuances and the ability to adapt content for Spanish-speaking audiences.
Familiarity with subtitling and video editing software is a plus.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality translations.
Ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:17 UTC
Category: General Translation Services
Skills:English, Video Editing
Skills: English, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Real Estate Photo & Video Quality Control - Upwork
item.description:
JRP  (meetjrp.com) is a leading real estate photo and video agency dedicated to delivering high-quality visual content for the real estate industry. Our mission is to provide exceptional media services that help real estate professionals showcase their properties in the best possible light. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a dedicated Quality Control Specialist to join our team and ensure the highest quality standards in our deliverables.

We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Quality Control Specialist to join our team on a part-time, remote basis. The ideal candidate will be responsible for reviewing and ensuring the quality of our photo and video content on a daily basis before it is delivered to our clients. This role is crucial in maintaining the reputation and quality standards of JRP Media Agency.

Responsibilities:

Review and evaluate real estate photos and videos daily for quality, consistency, and adherence to client specifications.
Ensure all media content meets our high standards of visual and technical quality.
Collaborate with photographers, videographers, and editors to address quality issues and provide constructive feedback.
Maintain detailed records of quality control processes and findings.
Work closely with the production team to implement quality improvement initiatives.


Requirements:

Proven experience in quality control, preferably in the media or real estate industry.
Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for visual and technical quality.
Experience using video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
Proficiency with photo editing software, including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Bridge, and Lightroom.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.
A reliable fast-internet connection and suitable home office setup are a MUST.

Benefits:

Flexible work hours.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and creative team.
Remote work environment.
Competitive compensation.

Website:
For more information about JRP, visit our website at meetjrp.com.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:24 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Image Processing, Image Editing, Quality Control
Skills: Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Image Processing, Image Editing, Quality Control
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for CELEBRITY niche channel - Upwork
item.description:
Title:
Looking for an experienced YouTube Video Editor for a CELEBRITY niche channel.

Description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You’re responsible for creating engaging 8 to 12-minute videos 1 to 3 times weekly.

Examples:
Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.
1. SunnyV2 : https://www.youtube.com/@SunnyV2
2. Just In Celeb: https://www.youtube.com/@JustInCeleb
3. Anna Oop: https://www.youtube.com/@annaoop

Requirements:
1.  English expert
2. Professional software- proficient in video editing
3. 48 hours or less turnaround time
4. Able to create engaging and professional videos
5. Able to edit raw footage, add graphics and effects, optimize video and audio quality
6. Creative and detail-oriented
7. Willing to work long term and grow with the team

10 Videos for $400--- paid $40 after each video is made

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Looking forward to receiving your work.

Budget: $400

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production

item.title: Social Media Video Editing Expert - Upwork
item.description:
ATTENTION: Social Media Video Editing Expert

We are seeking a social media video editing expert to assist us on an ad hoc basis.

ABOUT US
Opsize is a consultancy focused on supersizing success for startups and small businesses. Our brand imagery is futuristic and cyberpunk-inspired, centred around fast food diner metaphors and technology.

TO APPLY, YOU'LL HAVE
🍔 A keen eye for detail
🍔 High competency in video editing
🍔 Several years of experience creating engaging video content
🍔 Proficiency with Instagram Reels and current trends
🍔 Fluent in English

JOB DETAILS
We have a backlog of videos that need to be transformed into Instagram Reels. The specific video for this task is 2:20 minutes long and has already been cut using Descript to remove filler words. The content revolves around startup education.

YOUR TASK
🍟 Review our Instagram and brand style
🍟 Add graphics, captions, and edits that align with our content and brand

OUR BRAND
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kev_opsize/
Website: https://www.opsize.co/
Colour Assets:
Jaguar: #0A0214
Shocking Pink: #FD00EA
Black: #000000
Electric Violet: #9A19F9
Alabaster: #FAFAFA

We describe our brand imagery as futuristic, cyberpunk-inspired, with a dark tone, often using a black background. Our business name, Opsize, plays on "upsizing your operations," with a lot of takeaway and food metaphors. Think of us as a futuristic diner for startups.

For aesthetic inspiration at the highest level, consider Matt Gray's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/matthgray/reels/

An example reel from Matt: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C1fBw0zxUB6/

HOW TO APPLY
If you are interested in this job, please apply by:
1️⃣ Sending a portfolio of 1-3 Instagram Reels you’ve created for other brands or creators.
2️⃣ Providing your cost for editing one video (~2 minutes). The video can be viewed: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1p3r1pmuU7vpCqf5-woohgdpLzYLRuMTy?usp=sharing

We plan to hire 2-3 contractors to test their abilities.

item.ns0:encoded:
ATTENTION: Social Media Video Editing Expert

We are seeking a social media video editing expert to assist us on an ad hoc basis.

ABOUT US
Opsize is a consultancy focused on supersizing success for startups and small businesses. Our brand imagery is futuristic and cyberpunk-inspired, centred around fast food diner metaphors and technology.

TO APPLY, YOU'LL HAVE
🍔 A keen eye for detail
🍔 High competency in video editing
🍔 Several years of experience creating engaging video content
🍔 Proficiency with Instagram Reels and current trends
🍔 Fluent in English

JOB DETAILS
We have a backlog of videos that need to be transformed into Instagram Reels. The specific video for this task is 2:20 minutes long and has already been cut using Descript to remove filler words. The content revolves around startup education.

YOUR TASK
🍟 Review our Instagram and brand style
🍟 Add graphics, captions, and edits that align with our content and brand

OUR BRAND
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kev_opsize/
Website: https://www.opsize.co/
Colour Assets:
Jaguar: #0A0214
Shocking Pink: #FD00EA
Black: #000000
Electric Violet: #9A19F9
Alabaster: #FAFAFA

We describe our brand imagery as futuristic, cyberpunk-inspired, with a dark tone, often using a black background. Our business name, Opsize, plays on "upsizing your operations," with a lot of takeaway and food metaphors. Think of us as a futuristic diner for startups.

For aesthetic inspiration at the highest level, consider Matt Gray's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/matthgray/reels/

An example reel from Matt: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C1fBw0zxUB6/

HOW TO APPLY
If you are interested in this job, please apply by:
1️⃣ Sending a portfolio of 1-3 Instagram Reels you’ve created for other brands or creators.
2️⃣ Providing your cost for editing one video (~2 minutes). The video can be viewed: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1p3r1pmuU7vpCqf5-woohgdpLzYLRuMTy?usp=sharing

We plan to hire 2-3 contractors to test their abilities.

Budget: $20

item.title: TikTok Video Editor for Business Account - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled TikTok video editor to create engaging and professional videos for our business account. The initial project involves editing around 10 30-second videos, with the potential for more if the results are excellent. As the video editor, you will be responsible for trimming and enhancing the footage, adding creative effects and transitions, and ensuring the videos align with our brand guidelines. The ideal candidate should have experience editing TikTok videos, a strong sense of storytelling, and a keen eye for detail.

Key skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Knowledge of TikTok trends and editing techniques
- Understanding of social media marketing strategies

This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate-level TikTok video editor who can deliver professional and engaging videos that resonate with our audience.

In your response - please share you best two tiktok videos which show your editing abilities.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:05 UTC
Category: Accounting
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Creative Video Editor Needed-1 - Upwork
item.description:
Creative and patient video editor is needed to create/edit batches of Youtube videos, mostly youtube shorts.  This is a test project, if we find you to be a great team player with us, the project can be turned into long term.   

The project budget is for a collection of Youtube short videos. Project details will be given to you if we find you to be a good fit.

When you place your bid, please let us know the following:

1) Are you familiar with using Capcut, Filmora or Canva?   What is your most preferred editing software?

2) This is not required, but we'd like to know what your other capabilities are - Are you familiar in using video generating ai tools (the ones that can use text to video or video to video or image to video?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?  Also, Are you familiar in using image generating ai tools?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?

3) What is your internet speed?  If we find you to be a good fit to help us long term, how many hours per week can you devote to help us?  Can these hours be spread out Monday through Friday?  Or, you will be working on weekends?

Please show us your past related video work.

Look forward to working with you!  We hope you are a great match for our project!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 01:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
